Binocular thermal imaging camera Manually close this warning. The warning is back to normal
After confirming the real fire alarm, all emergency contacts and the leaders of the jurisdiction will receive a telephone notice and rush to the scene for disposal. \nWhen confirming the real fire alarm, the fire alarm needs to be manually turned off after the fire is eliminated
When confirming a safety hazard, you need to manually close the warning event after the hidden danger is eliminated
